title: Remake Problems since the Latest Patch! (7.15)
body:
Everything was fine till the loading screen.
What happened?
0% for every players, game didn't started for me but for the other players it did.
After mins of waiting, remake.
I tried to play again, same happened.
Stucked at 0% then I tried to reconnect and relog fast but it didn't help.
Tried again.. LeaverBuster
After the 20mins of waiting....remake.
I'm not only the one with this problem.

(my internet is fine, everything is fine)

Help meh pls. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Since you keep getting stuck on the loading screen specifically, we probably need to take a step back and troubleshoot what's going on with your network to figure out why it can't get a solid signal to our game servers. 

Double check that the right ports are open for your network to communicate with our servers, but be sure to go through the rest of the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover the rest of your bases as well. Test these changes in a custom game to make sure you avoid any penalties.

Hey again! 
I disabled Windows Firewall in "services.msc" then I changed my dns to 8.8.8.8 , 8.8.4.4 and everything is fine! (needed a restart)
No more stuck in loading screen. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
